commit.message:
fix(cli): avoid npm gitignore rename on new plugins (#3292)

Co-authored-by: jcesarmobile <jcesarmobile@gmail.com>
fix(android): don't return 404 on empty files (#3323)
fix(ios): only open a URL when the application is active (#3328)
fix(android): Provide a file name when an image is saved to the gallery to prevent crash (#3331)
chore: make deploy script push to 2.x branch (#3337)
